tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
quoteText: If your content has been removed due to a DMCA takedown notice, you believe you have a legal right to use the material, and you want to legally dispute this claim, you can file a DMCA counter-notification.
